title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: Colored silks on white in uncut voided velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Design of armorial shield alternating with head of a dark-complexioned woman wearing ribboned headdress.  Colors: pink, white, blue, and black on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. Colored silks on white in uncut voided velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-29.
